description: Main entry point for a Flutter application that initializes and displays the MyApp widget, which in turn shows a simple home page with a progress indicator and message.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, sets up MaterialApp theme and initial page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget that displays the app's main screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, builds the scaffold with app bar and body content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
